string-array.name: mates_plus_dates_clues
string-array.item: 1. 5:45 \n Can\'t believe how cold it is and the grass is all wet, yuck. It\'s okay though, Matt gave me his coat, I think he really likes me.
2. 8:34 \n Hey guys, hope you\'re having a better time than I am. Ben is such a bore, I don\'t think I\'ll be doing this again. xoxoxo love, Sarah oxoxox

3. 9:24 \n Wow, this movie is fantastic and he\'s just as into it as I am. I don\'t think it\'d ever be as fun with a geek like Matt (no offence). I don\'t ever want this to end. Good luck on your dates, love Natalie
